data.name: NGU Saves - Dark Mode
Reskinned embeded google calendar
data.description:
Reskins the google embeded calendar into a more modern looking one. Only for monhtly view.
This is made for iframes on your locally running websites.
Add "https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed" as URL starting with, in the Stylus manage panel

data.name: DLsite DRM warning
data.description: Makes DRM warnings on DLsite less deceptive.

data.name: Google Static
data.description: Google search interface always visible on screen, and some additional changes for more compact layout.

data.name: Surviv.io Hotline Miami
洛谷犇犇、讨论隐藏
data.description:
作者已经基本停止维护。

========================

需要专心刷题时可启用本样式，避免社区功能的干扰。

如果在国内无法安装 stylus，可以尝试在 www.chromefor.com 上下载。

如果隐藏了不该隐藏的东西或者有其它建议，欢迎在洛谷私信@ouuan

如果有不想隐藏的元素，直接修改源码即可（代码中有注释）
